title: Which group’s best-known recording is the 1967 single ‘A Whiter Shade of Pale’? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bonzo Dog Doo Dah Band had their third greatest hit with A Whiter Shade of Pale. Their second greatest hit was with A Lighter Shade of Pale. Their greatest hit was with The Whitest Shade of Pale. None of these songs actually charted, and the Bonzos had to rely on other songs to derive an income. Yet their Pale trilogy became a forerunner to Star Wars, Indiana Jones and Back to the Future film trilogies, so the Bonzos are remember fondly for their achievements. Great question, keep them coming.

Procol Harum of course but there is so so many better deep cuts from this band that it’s criminal. There is also Conquistator of course but seriously check out the following and see if you don’t come a away a big fan: Song for a Dreamer A Salty Dog Long Gone Geek Whiskey Train (Featuring Robin Trower on guitar) a song that Lenny Kravitz would later borrow from a bit for his hit Are You Gonnna Go My Way? And my Personal favorite this one here Quite Rightly So:
